home_hero_heading: Drive Your Future with El Quality Inc
home_hero_subheading: Reliable Trucking Services & Great Opportunities for Owner-Operators
home_welcome_text: Founded in 2019, El Quality Inc is a trusted name in the trucking industry, serving all states with a commitment to safety, reliability, and driver support. We specialize in Dry Van, Drop & Hook, and Flatbed services, with capabilities extending to Reefer, Hazmat, and more. We partner with major brokers like Amazon, JB Hunt, and Schneider to provide consistent, high-quality freight.
home_feature1_text: Strong partnerships with major brokers ensure consistent and diverse freight opportunities across all states.
home_feature2_text: Our Safety and Fleet Management teams have over 10 years of industry experience, providing excellent support.
home_feature3_text: We offer competitive pay structures and reliable payment options, including advances upon work completion.
about_intro: Our company was founded in 2019 and has been operating since then. We have built a reputation for reliability and quality service in the trucking industry.
about_team_desc: We have dedicated Safety Management and Fleet Managers, forming a strong department with over 10 years of experience in the trucking industry. We understand the challenges drivers face and are committed to supporting them every step of the way.
about_values_desc: At El Quality Inc, we prioritize safety, efficiency, and driver satisfaction. We believe in building strong relationships with our owner-operators and providing them with the resources they need to succeed. Our experienced team ensures smooth operations and reliable service for our clients.
services_intro: El Quality Inc offers a wide range of transportation services across all states and potentially Canada. We are committed to providing reliable and efficient logistics solutions.
services_cargo_desc: We specialize primarily in Dry Van and Drop & Hook services, including flatbed cargo. However, our capabilities extend to various other types, such as Reefer, Hazmat, Step Deck, and more. We handle diverse freight, including Amazon loads, various dedicated lines, and mail.
services_market_desc: We maintain a competitive edge in the market through efficient operations and strong relationships. We work with experienced brokers and hold contracts with major players like Amazon, JB Hunt, Schneider, TQL, ensuring consistent and valuable freight opportunities.
services_ops_desc: We utilize a reliable wire payment system and offer advance payment options upon completion of work. For owner-operators, we can also assist with providing license plates (details to be discussed).
services_driver_req_desc: We are currently seeking experienced owner-operators (minimum 2 years of experience). We also consider company drivers who demonstrate excellent performance and reliability. Join our team and benefit from our supportive environment and strong industry connections.
apply_intro: Interested in joining the El Quality Inc team as an owner-operator? Please fill out the application form below. We require a minimum of 2 years of driving experience.
apply_form_message_label: Why do you want to work with El Quality Inc? (Optional):
apply_form_success_message: Thank you for your application! We will review it and contact you soon.
apply_form_error_message: Please fill out all required fields correctly.
contact_intro: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you're an owner-operator looking for opportunities or a potential client, feel free to reach out using the form below or contact us directly.
contact_form_success_message: Your message has been sent successfully! We will get back to you shortly.
contact_form_error_message: Please fill out all required fields correctly.
